name: Golfantasy
description:
Golf your way to the end as you meet obstacles. Your mystic creatures are very happy to help you. 

Can you find your way to the end in no time?

How to play?

  • Click and drag to shoot the golf ball.
  • Right click to use a special ability when you have one equipped.

Made By:

  • ItzJorinoPlays
